ADMA_list_directory_contents.description: Given a path of directory on ADMA, return the list of paths under the directory.

ADMA_list_directory_contents&dir_path.description: ADMA_list_directory_contents&dir_path is a path of the directory on the ADMA system.

ADMA_list_directory_contents&output_list.description: ADMA_list_directory_contents&output_list is a list of paths in the ADMA system.
ADMA_list_directory_contents&output_list_current_index is the current index of ADMA_list_directory_contents&output_list.

subscribe_list_1.call_condition: Only call this method when ADMA_list_directory_contents&output_list_current_index is less than the length of ADMA_list_directory_contents&output_list
subscribe_list_1.description: Given a list of path and an index, return the path at the index and increase the index by 1.

subscribe_list_2.call_condition: Only call this method when ADMA_list_directory_contents&output_list_current_index is less than the length of ADMA_list_directory_contents&output_list
subscribe_list_2.description: Given a list of path and an index, return the path at the index and increase the index by 1.

ADMA_get_meta_data.description: Given a path on ADMA, return the meta data of the path on the ADMA server.

ADMA_get_meta_data&path.description: ADMA_get_meta_data&path is a path of the file or folder on the ADMA server.

ADMA_get_meta_data&meta_data.description: ADMA_get_meta_data&meta_data is the meta data of the file or folder on the ADMA server.
